changeSet.sql: create table if not exists book_need ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, active tinyint(1) default 1, need_date datetime null, need_expiration_date datetime null, title varchar(100) null, description varchar(500) null, category varchar(100) null, communication_method varchar(100) null, status varchar(100) null, city_id bigint null, user_id bigint null, image_url varchar(500) null, book_name varchar(200) null, book_author varchar(100) null, book_language varchar(100) null, book_publisher varchar(100) null, foreign key book_need_city_id (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), foreign key book_need_user_id (user_id) references user_ (id) );
